BIOGRAPHY

Meet Charles Mwangi, a Software Developer and Tech Enthusiast with a strong background in Computer Science. Passionate about solving complex problems and delivering efficient algorithms, he believes in clarity and directness when communicating with others. His personal brand is centered around empowering innovation through robust software solutions. His goal is to constantly innovate and create meaningful applications. His achievements include developing highly optimized algorithms and spearheading the development of innovative mobile applications
